onBackPressed() - Method in class com.example.offlinequiz.Home
Makes sure there is an "end point" so the user does not end up going back through their entire screen history.
onBackPressed() - Method in class com.example.offlinequiz.QuizActivity
Prevents the user from accidentally exiting the quiz by requiring them to press the back button twice within 2 seconds to quit.
